name: C O S M
description: Explore worlds within worlds as you zoom into fascinating scientific environments built using real data. Discover a jungle of neurons, or watch as molecules read DNA. COSM Worlds brings science to life right before your eyes. COSM Worlds offers both VR and non-VR experiences.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 780 GTX Storage: 300 MB available space
